item.title: Servelet
item.description: 一、servelet请求乱码 get方法请求乱码 String fname = request.getParameter("fname"); //转换为字节数组“ISO-8859-1”编码 byte[] bytes = fname.getBytes("ISO-8859-1"); //重新编码 fname = new String(bytes, "UTF-8"); post请
